Description:
A GOOD HOME IS NOW A GREAT HOME
Freshly renovated throughout is this easy-care 3 bedroom home located in Cranbourne Central. Whether you are looking at downsizing or wishing to get into the market as a first home buyer. This affordable home would be ideal. Nothing to do, it is without a doubt fresher than a daisy.
- Offering brand new kitchen with s/s appliances including oven/dishwasher/range hood
- New quality flooring - floating floor & tiles in wet areas
- Elegant bathroom boasting modern vanity and shower
- Master bedroom with double built in robes and other 2 with single robes
- Cosy courtyard with convenient access to the carport
Chances are, this property will not last long on the market. Terrific opportunity which you cannot afford to miss out. Best to act now, so come through our Opens or ring me for an inspection.
Insights: 165 other 3 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
The search is over
Located in the Brookland Greens estate is this immaculate family home boasting so much more than just its location. Featuring;
- Three spacious bedrooms master with WIR and ensuite.
- Two large separate living areas with a very spacious kitchen.
- A double car lock up garage with remote access.
- Two separate bathrooms will not mean you need to wait long to get ready.
Other features include heating and cooling throughout, 668sqm of land, undercover pergola and with local parks, schools, shops, Public transport, Settlers Run Golf Course, all within close distance this home really does offer you everything you could want.

Description:
The perfect spot to feel at home
BROOKLAND GREENS: Quickly becoming one of the most desirable estates in Cranbourne, Brookland Greens is known for its quality homes as well as the convenience of location. Westernport Highway, South Gippsland Highway and Cranbourne-Frankston Road are all easily accessed from the estate which brings you within minutes of Cranbourne Centro, the Cranbourne Racetrack, medical centres, public transport, public and private schools, sports centres and swimming pools.
Ticking all the boxes, this elegant and functional family home features
- 4 bedrooms and 2 living areas
- Master with large WIR and ensuite
- Welcoming and spacious front living area
- Open plan kitchen/family/dining with 2 sets of sliding doors to undercover alfresco, perfect for entertaining
- Plenty of storage in kitchen with overhead cupboards, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and feature window splashback
- Low maintenance gardens and backyard big enough for the kids and fur-babies
- Evaporative cooling and ducted heating
- Double garage with remote control and internal access
An immaculate home that would suit any buyer, don't hesitate to contact us to inspect today or you may miss out.
Insights: 13 Kingsbarn Court, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 83 other 4 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
879SQM READY TO BUILD ON!
Set only a short walk from the train station is this great opportunity to secure 879sqm (approx) of land in Cranbourne central. Comes complete with approved plans & permits for FOUR UNITS, making it ready to go now. Perfect for developers & investors, the approved plans allow for three double storey townhouses with a single storey set to the rear, all with appropriate parking. The existing brick home wouldn't take much preparation to be leased if you have a longer term view. The site benefits from a great location close to many central amenities, including public transport, shopping centres and schools. Blocks this size are becoming rare, so be quick, it will be gone before you know it! Call Today!

Description:
**SOLD BY PAUL RINGERI**
CRANBOURNE (125169422): **FOR SALE BY TENDER - $285,000 + BUYERS: OFFERS CLOSING WEDNESDAY, 3RD MAY @ 5:00PM (IF NOT SOLD PRIOR)** Its all about the location with this middle unit positioned in a secure block of only 3. With every amenity at your fingertips you, or your future tenants, will be able to sell the car and walk to everything!
Instantly comfortable with an existing tenant, this gem is ideal for investors and first home buyers/empty nesters who are keen to move in and occupy down the track.
Inside you will find a generous lounge/dining room with gas heating and a split system air conditioner. The spacious hostess kitchen is complete with a corner pantry, electric oven, gas cook top and dishwasher.
There are 2 bedrooms, both featuring built in wardrobes, plus a full laundry and a large central bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside theres a single garage and a grass free courtyard with a pergola area, extensive decking and a handy garden shed!
The location is second to none! Within a brisk walk to the Cranbourne train station and bus stop and only moments to all that Cranbourne has to offer including multiple forms of schooling, sporting/recreational facilities together with all of the amenities running along High Street, Thompsons Road and South Gippsland Highway! The recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre has an array of funky cafes and eating spots and is the perfect place to shop till you drop!
Offering fantastic value for money, this one is bound to walk out the door. Call now before its SELLING, SELLING, SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
INCREDIBLE DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
There is so much to say about this superb property! Located in Central Cranbourne on approximately 1202 square metres of prime symmetrical land.
- There are 8 bedrooms in total. The front dwelling boasts 6 bedrooms and is beautifully renovated. The back 2 bedrooms are ideal for a practitioner, business owner or in-law or teenage accommodation.
- In the rear, there is a spacious 2-bedroom unit separate to the house which also completed to a high level. It is fenced off separate from the main dwelling.
- Both kitchens are spacious and very practical. The main home has quality carpets and bamboo flooring & opens to a wonderful elevated alfresco from which you can enjoy this dream property.
- There is also an oversized double garage with rear access & you are within walking distance of both the local Primary and Secondary Schools. Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre is close by as is Cranbourne Train Station.
Opportunities like this don't come along often. If you have an extended family to cater for or plans to develop the land further (Stca and all relevant authorities). You may even have the idea of developing a respite house or similar then this one is made for you!

Description:
EXCELLENT VALUE
This beautifully presented double storey townhouse exudes a sense of calmness with manicured gardens. Whether you are a first home buyer, astute investor this opportunity is not one to be missed. Upon entry you are greeted by a large front living domain & study. Continuing down the hall passing the laundry is the powder room, ideally positioned for guests. You are then welcomed into the open family, dining & kitchen which features ample cabinetry, stainless steel appliances & a raised countertop suitable for a breakfast bar. The ducted heating & cooling keeps the home comfortable all season. The dining room looks out onto to the alfresco/patio area & private courtyard. The double garage & side access gate provides extra parking for a boat or caravan. Upstairs is complete with three robed bedrooms; the master is inclusive of a walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, as well as a full family bathroom with separate toilet.
Enquire today.

Description:
PRIME POSITION â?? GREAT OPPORTUNITY
Situated in Cranbourne's central hot spot is this delightful character filled 4-bedroom home with separate 1 bedroom bungalow with spacious living area in the rear yard.
- As you enter you are greeted by a large front fence providing privacy & you will see the lovely rendered exterior & lots of parking areas.
- Inside the warm colours continue into an attractive L shaped lounge/dining. There is also a functional timber kitchen with a 2-year-old wall oven.

This location is just brilliant you can walk to the local shops or a further short stroll to Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre. In fact, you are ideally positioned in the heart of Cranbourne's main precinct.

Description:
Within "Putting" Distance to Amstel Golf Club!
CRANBOURNE If you are looking for a low maintenance home then this is the one for you! Offering perfect presentation and a great location. This home would be ideal for first home buyers, an investor or someone looking to downsize.
Surround by well-presented homes and set adjacent to Amstel Golf Course, this exciting estate is within putting distance to primary and secondary schools, shopping centres, recreation fields and the train station. Fairway Park is an opportunity to embrace this evolving and convenient location, with everything you desire at your fingertips.
Within walking distance to superb parklands with BBQ facilities and the Amstel club open 7 days and boasts a fully licensed restaurant, new TAB & Sports bar, kids play area, multiple function rooms and hosting live entertainment weekly.
Offering 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe. Central kitchen with ample Caesarstone bench tops and cupboard space. The kitchen over looks family/meals area leading out to the court yard.
Features include:
- Ducted heating
- Split system
- Stainless steel appliances
- Caesarstone bench tops in the bathrooms
- Double remote garage with internal access
- Court yard
This vibrant estate presents an alternate housing offering in the booming Casey area, all within easy reach of the Melbourne CBD and Mornington Peninsula. 50km southeast from Melbournes CBD.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
Directions: Heading Cranbourne-Frankston Road heading toward Frankston, turn left into Willow Glen Boulevard then next then left into Augusta Street, follow right around past Denistoun Crescent and take the next right following into Augusta Street. Woodright is second road on the left.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!

Description:
Location and convenience
Situated on a spacious corner block and in a lovely section of the always popular Brookland Greens Estate is this ideal family home. Featuring:
- Master bedroom with retreat area, huge walk-in robe, dressing room with storage and ensuite with dual vanities, plus 3 further good sized bedrooms
- Modern galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop and dishwasher. There are also plenty of pot drawers for lots of storage.
- The separate dining area is large enough for the biggest dining table and adjoins the kitchen.
- The large family room is big enough to be multi-purpose. The sliding door leads to the very private and spacious deck and additional windows means you'll always see what the kids are up to in the back yardâ?¦
- Other features include: Brand new floating floors and carpet to all bedrooms; Ducted gas heating; Evap Cooling and Split System air conditioning.
- You'll always have peace of mind with the 2 station video intercom system. And there are 9 solar panels, ensuring your household budget is kept to a minimum.
- The block is approx. 591sqm. There is a double, remote controlled garage with direct access into the house; side access to the back yard via double gates and several fruit trees to ensure you'll always have the freshest fruit in Cranbourne.
Situated in the Brookland Greens Estate the home is just a short walk to the Brookland Greens Reserve with swings, meals area and parklands. It's also close to the Cranbourne Shopping centre, public transport, parks, golf courses, quality schools, colleges and all other amenities.
Contact Glenda Ashton today to book a private inspection.

Description:
An Exquisite Family Home That Will Not Last!
In a court location in ever popular Brookland Greens Estate, this ultra-modern 4 bedroom plus study family home simply oozes sophisticated living with its spacious contemporary interior and quality finishes throughout.
Upon entry, you are greeted with an open plan design, you will find the home office and large Master Bedroom equipped with amazing his and hers ensuite and walk in robe. Through to the rear of the home is where you will find an abundance of space for all your needs as it is complete with a family room, separate rumpus/theatre, dining room and kitchen. The sizeable kitchen is equiped with stone bench tops, glass splash-back, lots of cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, walk- in pantry and plentiful bench space. The remaining three bedrooms are all good-sized rooms with built in robes.
Outside you'll be impressed with a large aggregate paved alfresco entertaining area, which overlooks the very private and beautifully manicured low maintenance rear garden with a small garden shed for extra storage.
This exquisite family home is further enhanced by the double car garage which offers rear yard and internal access, ducted heating throughout, split system air conditioning located in the family room, tiled flooring and plush carpets.
A great sized family home in a fantastic location with quality living both inside and outside, close proximity to all amenities that Cranbourne has to offer and on a 522m2 approx. block, this house is truly a winner.

Description:
2219m2 Of Land with 4 Bedroom Ranch style Home
Looking for space for your growing family, sick of living on a small block with all your neighbours knowing your business. Then dont miss this opportunity to buy this home in a secluded pocket of Cranbourne, Offering everything from 4 Bedrooms, master with spa bath, formal lounge with open fire place, timber kitchen and family room, cathedral ceiling thought out, separate rumpus room. Ducted heating plus cooling.
Outside you have everything from double carport to large shedding and a 6 car garage ideal for the tradesperson or truck driver.
Close to St Peters collage, St Agathas primary school and Cranbourne park shopping centre.
Dont miss this great opportunity call now
